title: Advertising costs of Target in the U.S. 2010 to 2018
yAxis: Advertising spending in million U.S. dollars
summary: This chart shows the Advertising of spending conducted by Target in a U.S. 2010 .
\\n From the chart we see that the 2016 Fiscal was the Advertising costs Fiscal in the 2010 with 1600 spending .
The next Fiscal to make the most spending was the 2015 Fiscal with 1434 spending closely followed by 2010 with 1292 spending .
gold: This timeline shows the advertising expenditure of Target in North America from 2010 to 2018 . In 2012 , Target 's ad spending amounted to 1.39 billion U.S. dollars .
